=== About Me ===

I am a Washington, DC civil rights and employment lawyer with a longstanding interest in Linux from the perspective of an avid user with no formal technical training.  Having used Ubuntu for the past couple of years, I am again beginning to explore ways in which to give back to the community.  One current interest is promoting participation by legal professionals in the <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/group.php?groupid=209|Legal Access Group]]</nowiki>.
